import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'sukhveer-portfolio'; navComponenets: Array = ['Home', 'Education', 'Projects', 'Experience', 'Achievements', 'About']; boxes: Array = ['Box 1', 'Box 2', 'Box 3', 'Box 4']; }
